entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:29 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Colborne 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: WSW 95 km/h gust 116 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 120. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 120 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
